# Plot 1 rough draft

Sarah Donaldson
```{r data_clean, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}

rstats <- readRDS(here::here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds")) %>% 
  group_by(screen_name) %>% 
  summarize(n=n()) %>% 
  mutate(screen_name = factor(screen_name)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  slice(1:25)

```

```{r plot1}
ggplot(rstats, aes(fct_reorder(screen_name, n), n)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(x = "screen_name")

```
